body.raw:
Thinking through what kinds of rewards make sense at a given time for completing a given task such as food drink vice activity rest or refresh


| food | drink | vice | activity | rest | refresh |
| ---- | ----- | ---- | -------- | ---- | ------- |
|      |       |      |          |      |         |
|      |       |      |          |      |         |


Re Maslow's Hierarchy of Needs
